html: These verses, describing the spiritual famine of the latter days (also described in Amos 8:11-12), have several variations, but the most significant is the Book of Mormon's usage of Zion in place of the KJV Ariel. In the JST, the Prophet Joseph Smith also made some slight changes in verse 8, but none in verse 7. This may indicate either that he did not complete the revision of this section in the JST or that the word "Ariel" may have a broader application than previously, supposed. Note that the KJV verse 8 concludes with "mount Zion" and not "Ariel."
